Info

About This Site

This is a minimalist website built with Jekyll and inspired by the "no style, please" theme. The goal is to create a fast, clean, and content-focused experience with minimal distractions.

About Me

Hello! I'm a developer/creator who values simplicity and performance. This website reflects those values through its minimalist design and fast loading times.

Technology

  • Static Site Generator: Jekyll
  • Theme: no style, please (customized)
  • Markdown: Kramdown with LaTeX support
  • CSS: Under 1kb of custom styles
  • Hosting: GitHub Pages ready

Contact

You can reach me at: your.email@example.com

Source Code

This website is open source. You can find the source code on GitHub.
